overview.headline: Übersicht
overview.content: Hier siehst du eine Übersicht deiner Bewertungen und eingehenden Beschwerden und Feedbackanfragen.

showFinished.headline: Show Finished Exercises
showFinished.content: In order to see all exercises, just tick the checkbox <tt>Show finished exercises</tt>.

exerciseTable.headline: Übungentablle
exerciseTable.content: Diese Tabelle zeigt alle aktiven Übungen dieses Kurses an. Um die beendeten Übungen anzuzeigen musst du nur die Checkbox <tt>Beendete Übungen anzeigen</tt> klicken, welche direkt über dieser Tabelle abgebildet ist.

gradingProcess.headline: Bewertungsprozess
gradingProcess.content: Dieser Graph visualisiert deinen aktuellen Bewertungsstatus für diese Übung.

exerciseDashboardButton.headline: Aufgaben Dashboard
exerciseDashboardButton.content: Lass uns nun zum Aufgaben Dashboard navigieren um die Details der Übung und der Studentenabgaben einzusehen.

instructions.headline: Instructions
instructions.content: This section contains the <tt>Problem statement</tt>, <tt>Example solution</tt> and <tt>Grading instruction</tt> of the exercise. Please read through them carefully and then proceed to the next step.

instructionsButton.headline: Confirm instructions
instructionsButton.content: Click on this button and confirm only after you have read and understood the instructions.

reviewExampleSubmission.headline: Review Example Submission
reviewExampleSubmission.content: Click here to see how a submission could look like.

assessExampleSubmission.headline: Assess Example Submission
assessExampleSubmission.content: Click here to work on your first assessment.

submissionsAndComplaints.headline: Student submission
submissionsAndComplaints.content: The student submissions will be displayed here.

reviewSubmission.headline: Review Example Submission
reviewSubmission.content: Here you can see an example submission.

reviewAssessment.headline: Review Example Assessment
reviewAssessment.content: This is an example assessment of the submission.

confirm.headline: Confirm
confirm.content: Let's confirm and head over to the example assessment.

addAssessment.headline: Assess Example Submission
addAssessment.task: Mark each pattern and add an assessment by clicking on the <tt>Assess</tt> button.

addScore.headline: Add Score
addScore.content: Here you can add a score and additional feedback for each assessment element.
addScore.task: Add a score for each pattern.

submit.headline: Submit Assessment
submit.content: Now you can submit your assessment

back.headline: Complete Assessment Tour
back.content: Navigate back to the exercise dashboard to complete your tour.
